# Commands

```
git init
git add .
git commit –m "first commit :tada:"
git remote add origin https://github.com/your-user-name/project-name.git
git push -u origin master
```
---

# Commands

every time you make a change:

```
git add filename
git commit –m "describe your file change here"
git push -u origin master
```
